result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Michael A Cantwell in court with attorney Jillian Jean Scheidegger for Atty Patrick Cafferty.  Defendant Michael A Cantwell in custody.  Jennifer Tanck-Adams appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Darlene Shue.
Upon plea to 15CF1332, Ct 1 as amended, 15CF1862, Ct 1 as amended and Ct 3 as charged, the State recommends prob; absolute sobriety, no contact with victim, domestic abuse counseling. Parties asks that the deft not be released to allow deft to complete behavioral health program

Atty Sally Hoelzel
Preliminary hearing at 11-18-2015 08:30 am

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

ADDRESS INFO for Michael A Cantwell
Current: 5600 Brook Haven Drive, Racine, WI 53406 United States  (Effective: 11-09-2015)
Prior: 4131 Cth H, Sturtevant, WI 53177
